query:
SELECT 
                    f.id,
                    f.created_at,
                    CASE 
                        WHEN f.user1_id = $1 THEN f.user2_id
                        ELSE f.user1_id
                    END as friend_id,
                    u.username as friend_username,
                    u.avatar as friend_avatar,
                    u.banned as friend_banned,
                    u.warned as friend_warned
                FROM friendships f
                JOIN users u ON (
                    CASE 
                        WHEN f.user1_id = $1 THEN f.user2_id
                        ELSE f.user1_id
                    END
                ) = u.id
                WHERE f.user1_id = $1 OR f.user2_id = $1
                ORDER BY f.created_at DESC
